Macros | Functions
Clock and Reset Management (CRM)
mcu » apollo330P

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module handles clock management and system reset functionality for Apollo5 devices. It provides comprehensive control over system clocks, power domains, and reset mechanisms to ensure optimal operation and power efficiency.

Key Features

  1. Clock Management: Flexible clock source and distribution control.
  2. Reset Control: System and peripheral reset management.
  3. Power Domains: Clock gating and power domain control.
  4. Dynamic Scaling: Runtime clock frequency adjustment.
  5. Status Monitoring: System clock and reset status tracking.

Functionality

  • Configure and manage system clocks
  • Control peripheral clock gates
  • Handle system and peripheral resets
  • Manage power domain states
  • Monitor clock and reset status

Usage

  1. Configure system clock sources and dividers
  2. Manage peripheral clock enables
  3. Control system and peripheral resets
  4. Monitor system status and flags

Configuration

  • Clock Sources: Select and configure clock sources
  • Divider Settings: Configure clock dividers
  • Gate Control: Set up peripheral clock gating
  • Reset Options: Configure reset behavior
